title: New Wisconsin State Hall of Famers!
author: GFCBA Staff
excerpt: Congrats to our association's own Pam Haertl, Rob Schuh, and Melissa Lang for their well-deserved induction into the Wisconsin State Bowling Hall of Fame!
content: Congrats to our association's own Pam Haertl (GFCUSBC Hall-of-Fame Class of 1992), Rob Schuh (GFCUSBC Hall-of-Fame Class of 2015), and Melissa Lang for their well-deserved induction into the Wisconsin State Bowling Hall of Fame! Read more about their accomplishments at https://wibowl.com/wisconsin-bowling-hall-of-fame-announces-2025-inductees/
